info.title: AI Crash Course Quiz 1
info.description: This quiz tests your knowledge on various machine learning topics. Read each question carefully and select the best answer. Good luck!

questions.question: What is the primary goal of supervised learning?
Which algorithm is used for classification problems?
What is overfitting?
choices: Model performing well on training data but poorly on new data
Model performing poorly on both training and new data
questions.answer: Model performing well on training data but poorly on new data

questions.question: What is the purpose of the activation function in a neural network?
What does 'k' represent in the k-Nearest Neighbors algorithm?
Which metric is commonly used to evaluate classification models?
What technique is used to reduce the dimensionality of data?
What is a hyperparameter?
choices: A parameter that is learned from the data
A parameter that is set before the learning process begins
A parameter that measures model performance
questions.answer: A parameter that is set before the learning process begins

questions.question: Which of the following is an unsupervised learning algorithm?
What does 'dropout' refer to in neural networks?
choices: Reducing overfitting by ignoring random neurons
questions.answer: Reducing overfitting by ignoring random neurons

questions.question: What is the purpose of a validation set?
What is 'gradient descent'?
choices: An optimization algorithm to minimize cost function
questions.answer: An optimization algorithm to minimize cost function

questions.question: What is 'bagging' in ensemble methods?
choices: Using multiple models to reduce variance
Using one model to increase variance
questions.answer: Using multiple models to reduce variance

questions.question: Which loss function is commonly used in binary classification?
What is the role of the 'learning rate' in training neural networks?
choices: To control the step size in updating weights
To determine the number of hidden layers
questions.answer: To control the step size in updating weights

questions.question: What is 'regularization' in machine learning?
choices: A method to increase model complexity

questions.question: Which technique can be used to handle imbalanced datasets?
What is the purpose of a 'confusion matrix'?
choices: To visualize the performance of a classification model
questions.answer: To visualize the performance of a classification model

questions.question: What is 'reinforcement learning'?
choices: Learning from feedback to maximize reward
questions.answer: Learning from feedback to maximize reward

questions.question: Which algorithm is best suited for text classification?
